greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Binary encoding of 0-digits in ternary representation of A048673(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
mathematica: Map[FromDigits[IntegerDigits[#, 3] /. k_ /; k < 3 :> If[k == 0, 1, 0], 2] &, Table[(Times @@ Power[If[# == 1, 1, NextPrime@ #] & /@ First@ #, Last@ #] + 1)/2 &@ Transpose@ FactorInteger@ n, {n, 116}]] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Sep 12 2017 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 12 2017
